job.title: Software Engineer - Front End
job.description: stronguAbout The Opportunitybrbrustrongstrong Hey Were Grubhub brbrstrongWere all about connecting hungry diners with our network of over 300000 restaurants nationwide Innovative technology userfriendly platforms and streamlined delivery capabilities set us apart and make us an industry leader in the world of online food ordering When you join our team you become part of a community that works together to innovate solve problems grow work hard and have a ton of fun in the processbrbrstrong Why Work For Us brbrstrongWe are looking for a frontend engineer to join our organization The candidate will be working on a small agile team that is responsible for our Reactbased web application that is vital to our restaurant partners We emphasize building stable and scalable solutions as our team is responsible for the management of 600k1M food orders per day We pride ourselves on giving the best user experience possible with an emphasis on simple design and providing delight to our restaurant partnersbrbrstrong The Impact You Will Make brstrongulli Design implement and deliver awesome technical platforms and products for all constituencies diners corporate accounts restaurants internal tools lili Understand our products from both a technical and business perspective in the context of our larger business lili Communicate with leadership product owners other technologists and users to create working software based on an understanding of business and technical priorities lili Break down complex problems into elegant technical solutions to intelligently solve problems for diners restaurant corporate accounts and internal stakeholders lili Actively contribute to the adoption of strong software architecture development best practices and new technologies We are always improving the process of building software we need you to help contribute lili You will be a key part in accurately estimating the timing of software delivery brbrliulstronguWhat You Bring To The Tablebrustrongulli Bachelors or Masters Degree in Computer Science Software Engineering or related field lili Solid foundation in software programming in Javascript lili Experience in React preferred lili Experience with Typescript a plus lili Eagerness to contribute in a teamoriented environment lili Ability to work creatively and analytically in a problemsolving environment lili Familiar with Agile software development methodologies lili Interested in working for a fast paced tech and product oriented company brbrliulstrong And Of Course Perks brstrongulli strong Flexible PTO strongstrong  strong Grubhub employees enjoy a generous amount of time to recharge lili strong Health and Wellness strong Excellent medical benefits employee network groups and paid parental leave are just a few of our programs to support your overall wellbeing lili strong Competitive Pay Youll receive a competitive base salary with eligibility for generous incentives bonuses commission or RSUs rolespecific strong lili strong Learning and Career Growth strong Your personal and professional development is a priority at Grubhub We empower you to be a leader and grow your career through training coaching and mentorship opportunities lili strong MealPerks strong Get meals on us Our employees get a weekly Grubhub credit to enjoy and support local restaurants lili strong Fun strong Every Grubhub office has an employeeled Culture Crew that connects people through fun meaningful events and initiatives like Wellness Wednesdays Slack competitions and virtual happy hours lili strong Social Impact strong At Grubhub we believe in giving back through programs like the Grubhub Community Relief Fund and donating 1 million to the Equal Justice Initiative in 2020 Employees are also given paid time off each year to support the causes that are important to them lili strong COVID19 Response strong All of our employees are currently working from home and will be for the foreseeable future We look forward to seeing everyone inoffice when its safe to return brliulGrubhub is an equal opportunity employer We welcome diversity and encourage a workplace that is just as diverse as the customers we serve We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race color religion age sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability veteran status and other legally protected characteristics If youre applying for a job in the US and need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the employment process please send an email to TalentAcquisitiongrubhubcom and let us know the nature of your request and contact information Please note that only those inquiries concerning a request for reasonable accommodation will be responded to from this email addressbrbrCA Privacy Notice If you are a resident of the State of California and would like a copy of our CA privacy notice please email privacygrubhubcom
